title: For Loop with Condition
description: A simple for loop that prints even numbers between 1 and 10.

title: Factorial with Recursion
description: A recursive function to calculate the factorial of a number.

title: Fibonacci Sequence
description: Generates the first 10 numbers in the Fibonacci sequence using iteration.

title: Nested Loops for Multiplication Table
description: Uses nested loops to print a multiplication table for numbers 1 to 5.

title: Bubble Sort
description: Implements the Bubble Sort algorithm to sort an array in ascending order.

title: Reverse a String
description: Reverses a given string using StringBuilder.

title: Map and Filter Example
description: Filters even numbers from an array and squares them using map and filter.

title: Check for Prime Numbers
description: Checks whether a number is prime using trial division.

title: Binary Search Algorithm
description: Performs a binary search on a sorted array to find a target element.

title: Reduce Function for Sum
description: Uses the reduce function to sum all elements in an array.
